"Dark side of UA"
"Couldn't leave Eri alone with him for the sake of her mental sanity"
"I wonder if his mental disability has a...
body:
“Dark side of UA”

“Couldn’t leave Eri alone with him for the sake of her mental sanity”

“I wonder if his mental disability has a name ?”

I’m really mad they didn’t interact more ok ? I’m really mad she’s absolutely terrified of him OK ?

summary:
I’ve been hearing the song everywhere recently so I came up with this.
This is based on my villain deku au which you can read...
body:
I’ve been hearing the song everywhere recently so I came up with this.

This is based on my villain deku au which you can read here: https://archiveofourown.org/series/1169252

It Took Two - Villain deku au - Tsukiyomi_Hikaru - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Ar

So here Deku and Kacchan meet each other, maybe while they’re on the job? Kacchan wants Deku to run away with him, and forget about the past. But then Deku’s like, we can’t run away from the past, history WILL rewrite itself.

Then it goes to a flashback when Deku and Kacchan reunite for the first time since shit happened. (This part is written under the title “Desperado”) Kacchan was walking around the city and coincidentally so was Deku. Since they’re on different sides, they don’t get to make the decisions. Too much has changed in the past 2 years.

On the last three slides, it’s about if the past ended up differently. Deku having seconds thoughts about jumping, and Kacchan arriving at the rooftop earlier. That’s why there’s a parallel in the drawing, kacchan hugging deku, deku on the other side of the railing.

Then lastly, the cold harsh reality.


:D

I’ve been hearing the song everywhere recently so I came up with this.

This is based on my villain deku au which you can read here: https://archiveofourown.org/series/1169252

It Took Two - Villain deku au - Tsukiyomi_Hikaru - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Ar

So here Deku and Kacchan meet each other, maybe while they’re on the job? Kacchan wants Deku to run away with him, and forget about the past. But then Deku’s like, we can’t run away from the past, history WILL rewrite itself.

Then it goes to a flashback when Deku and Kacchan reunite for the first time since shit happened. (This part is written under the title “Desperado”) Kacchan was walking around the city and coincidentally so was Deku. Since they’re on different sides, they don’t get to make the decisions. Too much has changed in the past 2 years.

On the last three slides, it’s about if the past ended up differently. Deku having seconds thoughts about jumping, and Kacchan arriving at the rooftop earlier. That’s why there’s a parallel in the drawing, kacchan hugging deku, deku on the other side of the railing.

Then lastly, the cold harsh reality.
